availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: J. H. Bradshaw (Powell County, Kentucky, sheriff and brick maker)

body.p: Powell County, Kentucky, sheriff and brick maker. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Bradshaw. Father of Caroline Bradshaw, James Bradshaw, Clinton Bradshaw, Martha A. Bradshaw, and Louisa Bradshaw. Brick maker in Powell County in 1860. Sheriff in Powell County from 1860 to c1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Powell County, Stanton, p. 54.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1860,” in 1861 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1861), 199.
“Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1861,” in 1862 Kentucky Documents, Legislative Document No. 1. (Frankfort, Ky.: Jno. B. Major, State Printer, 1862), 211.
